title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 15, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 15, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Incident Response
items.content_text:
### IR Tools Collection / All-In-One Tools

*   [Flare (⭐7.5k)](https://github.com/fireeye/flare-vm) - A fully customizable, Windows-based security distribution for malware analysis, incident response, penetration testing.
*   [Kuiper (⭐831)](https://github.com/DFIRKuiper/Kuiper) - Digital Forensics Investigation Platform
*   [Velociraptor (⭐3.4k)](https://github.com/Velocidex/velociraptor) - Endpoint visibility and collection tool

### IR Tools Collection / Evidence Collection

*   [artifactcollector (⭐290)](https://github.com/forensicanalysis/artifactcollector) - The artifactcollector project provides a software that collects forensic artifacts on systems.
*   [Forensic Artifacts (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/ForensicArtifacts/artifacts) - Digital Forensics Artifact Repository
*   [Live Response Collection](https://www.brimorlabs.com/tools/) - Automated tool that collects volatile data from Windows, OSX, and \*nix based operating systems.

### IR Tools Collection / Knowledge Bases

*   [Digital Forensics Artifact Knowledge Base (⭐83)](https://github.com/ForensicArtifacts/artifacts-kb) - Digital Forensics Artifact Knowledge Base
*   [Windows Events Attack Samples (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/sbousseaden/EVTX-ATTACK-SAMPLES) - Windows Events Attack Samples
*   [Windows Registry Knowledge Base (⭐176)](https://github.com/libyal/winreg-kb) - Windows Registry Knowledge Base

### IR Tools Collection / Log Analysis Tools

*   [LogonTracer (⭐2.9k)](https://github.com/JPCERTCC/LogonTracer) - Tool to investigate malicious Windows logon by visualizing and analyzing Windows event log.
*   [Sigma (⭐9.4k)](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma) - Generic signature format for SIEM systems already containing an extensive ruleset.

### IR Tools Collection / Memory Analysis Tools

*   [Volatility 3 (⭐3.2k)](https://github.com/volatilityfoundation/volatility3) - The volatile memory extraction framework (successor of Volatility)

### IR Tools Collection / Other Lists

*   [Awesome Forensics (⭐4.4k)](https://github.com/cugu/awesome-forensics) - A curated list of awesome forensic analysis tools and resources.
*   [Didier Stevens Suite (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/DidierStevens/DidierStevensSuite) - Tool collection

### IR Tools Collection / Playbooks

*   [ThreatHunter-Playbook (⭐4.3k)](https://github.com/OTRF/ThreatHunter-Playbook) - Playbook to aid the development of techniques and hypothesis for hunting campaigns.

### IR Tools Collection / Sandboxing/Reversing Tools

*   [Ghidra (⭐58k)](https://github.com/NationalSecurityAgency/ghidra) - Software Reverse Engineering Framework.
*   [Rizin (⭐3k)](https://github.com/rizinorg/rizin) - UNIX-like reverse engineering framework and command-line toolset

### IR Tools Collection / Scanner Tools

*   [Fenrir (⭐743)](https://github.com/Neo23x0/Fenrir) - Simple IOC scanner. It allows scanning any Linux/Unix/OSX system for IOCs in plain bash. Created by the creators of THOR and LOKI.
*   [Spyre (⭐169)](https://github.com/spyre-project/spyre) - Simple YARA-based IOC scanner written in Go

### IR Tools Collection / Windows Evidence Collection

*   [Hoarder (⭐202)](https://github.com/muteb/Hoarder) - Collecting the most valuable artifacts for forensics or incident response investigations.
items.content_html:
IR Tools Collection / All-In-One Tools

  • Flare (⭐7.5k) - A fully customizable, Windows-based security distribution for malware analysis, incident response, penetration testing.
  • Kuiper (⭐831) - Digital Forensics Investigation Platform
  • Velociraptor (⭐3.4k) - Endpoint visibility and collection tool

IR Tools Collection / Evidence Collection

  • artifactcollector (⭐290) - The artifactcollector project provides a software that collects forensic artifacts on systems.
  • Forensic Artifacts (⭐1.1k) - Digital Forensics Artifact Repository
  • Live Response Collection - Automated tool that collects volatile data from Windows, OSX, and *nix based operating systems.

IR Tools Collection / Knowledge Bases

  • Digital Forensics Artifact Knowledge Base (⭐83) - Digital Forensics Artifact Knowledge Base
  • Windows Events Attack Samples (⭐2.4k) - Windows Events Attack Samples
  • Windows Registry Knowledge Base (⭐176) - Windows Registry Knowledge Base

IR Tools Collection / Log Analysis Tools

  • LogonTracer (⭐2.9k) - Tool to investigate malicious Windows logon by visualizing and analyzing Windows event log.
  • Sigma (⭐9.4k) - Generic signature format for SIEM systems already containing an extensive ruleset.

IR Tools Collection / Memory Analysis Tools

  • Volatility 3 (⭐3.2k) - The volatile memory extraction framework (successor of Volatility)

IR Tools Collection / Other Lists

  • Awesome Forensics (⭐4.4k) - A curated list of awesome forensic analysis tools and resources.
  • Didier Stevens Suite (⭐2.3k) - Tool collection

IR Tools Collection / Playbooks

  • ThreatHunter-Playbook (⭐4.3k) - Playbook to aid the development of techniques and hypothesis for hunting campaigns.

IR Tools Collection / Sandboxing/Reversing Tools

  • Ghidra (⭐58k) - Software Reverse Engineering Framework.
  • Rizin (⭐3k) - UNIX-like reverse engineering framework and command-line toolset

IR Tools Collection / Scanner Tools

  • Fenrir (⭐743) - Simple IOC scanner. It allows scanning any Linux/Unix/OSX system for IOCs in plain bash. Created by the creators of THOR and LOKI.
  • Spyre (⭐169) - Simple YARA-based IOC scanner written in Go

IR Tools Collection / Windows Evidence Collection

  • Hoarder (⭐202) - Collecting the most valuable artifacts for forensics or incident response investigations.

items.title: Awesome Vulkan

Tools

items.title: Awesome Keycloak
items.content_text:
### Books

*   [Keycloak - Identity and Access Management for Modern Applications](https://www.packtpub.com/product/keycloak-identity-and-access-management-for-modern-applications/9781800562493)

### Articles

*   [Extending Keycloak: adding API key authentication](http://www.zakariaamine.com/2019-06-14/extending-keycloak)
*   [Extending Keycloak: using a custom email sender](http://www.zakariaamine.com/2019-07-14/extending-keycloak2)

### Example Projects

*   [Examples from Keycloak Book: Keycloak - Identity and Access Management for Modern Applications (⭐266)](https://github.com/PacktPublishing/Keycloak-Identity-and-Access-Management-for-Modern-Applications)
*   [Example of adding API Key authentication to Keycloak (⭐136)](https://github.com/zak905/keycloak-api-key-demo)

### Miscellaneous

*   [Pentest-Report Keycloak 8.0 Audit & Pentest 11.2019 by Cure53](https://cure53.de/pentest-report_keycloak.pdf)
*   [Keycloak - CNCF Security SIG - Self Assesment](https://docs.google.com/document/d/14IIGliP3BWjdS-0wfOk3l_1AU8kyoSiLUzpPImsz4R0/edit#)
items.content_html:
Books

  • Keycloak - Identity and Access Management for Modern Applications

Articles

  • Extending Keycloak: adding API key authentication
  • Extending Keycloak: using a custom email sender

Example Projects

  • Examples from Keycloak Book: Keycloak - Identity and Access Management for Modern Applications (⭐266)
  • Example of adding API Key authentication to Keycloak (⭐136)

  • Keycloak - CNCF Security SIG - Self Assesment

items.title: Awesome Static Website Services
items.content_text:
### Forms / Normal Forms

*   [Form2Channel](https://form2channel.com/) - Post your HTML form to Form2Channel to store submissions in Google Sheets and receive them via email, Slack or Telegram. No signups, no costs, no limits.
*   [reCAPTCHAme](https://recaptchame.com/) - reCAPTCHA and hCAPTCHA token verification service. Post your form to reCAPTCHAme to avoid getting spammed. Made for static websites, no server-side coding required.
items.content_html:
Forms / Normal Forms

  • Form2Channel - Post your HTML form to Form2Channel to store submissions in Google Sheets and receive them via email, Slack or Telegram. No signups, no costs, no limits.
  • reCAPTCHAme - reCAPTCHA and hCAPTCHA token verification service. Post your form to reCAPTCHAme to avoid getting spammed. Made for static websites, no server-side coding required.

items.title: Awesome Jamstack

items.title: Awesome Cheminformatics
items.content_text:
### Libraries / Machine Learning

*   [Summit (⭐131)](https://github.com/sustainable-processes/summit) - A python package for optimizing chemical reactions using machine learning (contains 10 algorithms + several benchmarks).
items.content_html:
Libraries / Machine Learning

  • Summit (⭐131) - A python package for optimizing chemical reactions using machine learning (contains 10 algorithms + several benchmarks).

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Developer Tools / Developer Utilities

*   [Responsively](https://responsively.app) - A must-have devtool for web developers for quicker responsive web development. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/responsively-org/responsively-app) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
items.content_html:
Developer Tools / Developer Utilities

  • Responsively - A must-have devtool for web developers for quicker responsive web development.
